item.title: Hacking Azure Functions in Python
item.description: Caveat: Support for Python on Azure Functions is still experimental so, some of the steps below might not be applicable anymore. I wanted to automate the capture of my running data so, this looked like an interesting scenario to try out Azure Functions.
